name: The Final Hoedown Live (Global Game Jam 2020)
name_original: The Final Hoedown Live (Global Game Jam 2020)
description: Welcome to the 2020 Hoedown Competition! Ladies and gents, hold onto your hats as the competition is coming to a conclusion. For your finalists, he has boots hotter than a snake curled around your porch, please welcome, Rafael Perez from North Dakota and for his, his dance is cooler than a spitbowl on a ranch, I give you, Nathanael Brown from Kansas. Congrats again to both of them for reaching the finals.And now, to see who is the winner for 2020 Hoedown Competition. Let the show begin!!!
